mapper.select: select T_Store_Info_ID as code,T_Store_Info_Name as name,T_Store_Info_Address as address,T_Store_Info_Manager_ID as managerID,T_Store_Info_Class as kind,T_Store_Info_Area as area,T_Store_Info_State as state from t_store_info
mapper.update: update t_store set T_Store_Name=#{name},T_Store_ID=#{goodID},T_Store_User_ID =#{userID},T_Store_Store_ID = #{warehouseID},T_Store_Number = #{quantity},T_Store_Price = #{price}, T_Store_Class =#{classID},T_Store_Remark =#{remark} where T_Store_Code=#{code}

update t_in_info set T_In_Info_Code = #{opCode},T_In_Info_ID = #{warehouseID},T_In_Info_Store_Code = #{goodID},T_In_Info_Store_T_ID = #{tGoodID},T_In_Info_Store_Name = #{goodName},T_In_Info_Store_Price = #{price},T_In_Info_Store_Class = #{classID},T_In_Info_Store_Number = #{quantity},T_In_Info_Remark = #{remark} where T_In_Info_Main_Key =#{code}

update t_move set T_Move_Op_ID = #{opID},T_Move_Aim_ID = #{aimID},T_Move_Source_ID = #{sourceID},T_Move_Date = #{date},T_Move_Store_Code = #{goodID},T_Move_Number =#{quantity},T_Move_State = #{state} where T_Move_Code = #{code}
